Title: The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad
Director: James Algar, Clyde Geronimi, Jack Kinney
Writer: Washington Irving (story "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow"), Kenneth Grahame (story "The Wind in the Willows"), Erdman Penner (story), Winston Hibler (story), Joe Rinaldi (story), Ted Sears (story), Homer Brightman (story), Harry Reeves (story)
Actors: Bing Crosby, Basil Rathbone, Eric Blore, J. Pat O'Malley
Plot: An animated adaptation of "The Wind in the Willows" followed by an adaptation of "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow".
